data.quote: The mexicans are born wherever th f..k we want to
data.author: Chabela Vargas

data.quote: I don’t study to know more but to ignore the less
data.author: Sor Juana Inés de la Cruz

data.quote: The first obligation of all humans is to be happy, the second one is to make happy to others
data.author: Mario Moreno

data.quote: I prefer to live being a slave of the principles, not of men
data.author: Emiliano Zapata

data.quote: It is better to die standing than living all life kneeled
data.author: Emiliano Zapata

data.quote: It is amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit
data.author: H. S. Truman

data.quote:
As high is the high sky
as deep is the deep sea
no barrier is in the world
that my deep love won't break for you
data.author: Cafe Tacuba

data.quote: The culture ends where the barbecue starts
data.author: Jose Vasconcelos

data.quote: The ones that don’t expect to win, it is already defeated
data.author: Benito Juarez

data.quote: I always say that what’s between you and your success is yourself
data.author: Eiza Gonzalez

data.quote: You don’t want to disappoint anybody, but you know, you lose your voice by trying to please everyone
data.author: Diego Luna

data.quote: For my race, my spirit shall speak
data.author: Jose Vasconcelos

data.quote: The responsibility of my acts might live as the consecuencies of them will do
data.author: Alvaro Obregon

data.quote: Be Impeccable With Your Word. Speak with integrity. Say only what you mean. Avoid using the word to speak against yourself or to gossip about others. Use the power of your word in the direction of truth and love
data.author: Miguel Ruiz

data.quote: There is beauty and humility in imperfection
data.author: Guillermo del Toro

data.quote: There are only two ways to influence human behavior: you can manipulate it or you can inspire it
data.author: Simon Sinek

data.quote: I prefer paying first to a teacher than to a general
data.author: Francisco Villa

data.quote: A team is not a group of people that work together. A team is a group of people that trust each other
data.author: Simon Sinek

data.quote: It is my life, my son; how you call it replies: ask for the best and you will get it, ask the worst and you will get it
data.author: Miguel Angel Cornejo

data.quote: It shouldn’t matter what you’re into, how you look - you can achieve whatever you aspire to
data.author: Yalitza Aparicio
